project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for user-specified numerical columns in a CSV file.

task.name: Implement functionality to read a CSV file
Implement functionality to calculate mean for numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate median for numerical columns
Implement functionality to calculate mode for numerical columns
Implement user input handling for choosing numerical columns
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure that they function correctly
